body.p:
Mt Sterling Montgomery County Ky
April 4th 1864
Governor Bramlett
Sir I want to inform you The whereabouts of the 1st Battallion of 73. E. M.. and its Condition
I have Elected Major & four Captains According to Law & order
I have to inform you that the Wickliff Men are about to seceed from order & swear vengence against your order & Say they will go to Jail before they will Muster under Lincolnits
I ask you as My Commanders to give Me the power to force them to Obey the Orders that is Required of them
I ask you to assest the fine not les than $5.00 nor over $25.00

Yours Respectfully
Lieut. Col. R. A. Thomas
P. S I have orders a company Muster the 3 Saturday in this Month

Ky State Militia
Mt Sterling Montgomery Co
April.4. 1864
Thomas R. A.
Lt Col 73rd E M
Has formed one Battalion and ordered Drills & Musters
